title: Denmark v Scotland, Isak in action for Sweden and more: 2026 World Cup qualifiers - clockwatch
summary: Barry Glendenning will provide live updates as Scotland faces Denmark in Copenhagen, along with coverage of nine additional World Cup qualifiers. Fans can expect real-time commentary and match insights. Stay tuned for the latest developments in these crucial matches.

title: Chelsea v Manchester City: WSL – football live
summary: Chelsea hosts Manchester City at Stamford Bridge to open the new Women's Super League (WSL) season. Rob Smyth provides minute-by-minute coverage of the match. Fans can follow the action as both teams compete for an early season advantage.

title: US Open tennis 2025: Novak Djokovic v Carlos Alcaraz, men’s semi-final – live
summary: Katy Murrells provides live updates from the first men's semi-final at Flushing Meadows. Fans can follow the game-by-game developments as the match progresses. This report highlights key moments and performances in the highly anticipated match.

title: Most of 475 people arrested by US immigration agents at Georgia Hyundai facility are Korean nationals – live
summary: ICE's investigative division carried out a warrant related to an ongoing criminal investigation. A spokesperson from homeland security confirmed the action to Reuters. Further details about the investigation have not been disclosed.

title: US added just 22,000 jobs in August, continuing slowdown amid Trump tariffs
summary: The latest report reveals that the US job market suffered a setback, with a loss of 13,000 jobs in June. This development adds to existing economic concerns. The survey highlights ongoing challenges in sustaining employment growth.
